mapper.select: SELECT tr.recipe_id, ti.item_id as r_itemid, ti.name as r_name, ti.desc as r_desc, tr.req_item AS req_itemid, ti1.name AS req_name, tr.r_item_cnt as req_itemcnt FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti INNER JOIN tbl_unt_recipe_nt01 tr ON ti.item_id = tr.item_id LEFT JOIN tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti1 ON tr.req_item = ti1.item_id WHERE ti.type_id = '1002' ORDER BY ti.item_id
SELECT ti.item_id as itemid, ti.name as itemnm, ti.desc as itemdesc, ti.sell_pri, ti.buy_pri as buyprice FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti WHERE ti.type_id = '3003'

SELECT tr.recipe_id AS recipe_id, ti.item_id AS itemid, ti.name AS itemnm, ti.desc AS itemdesc, tr.req_item AS req_item, ti1.name AS req_name, tr.r_item_cnt As req_itemcnt FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti INNER JOIN tbl_unt_recipe_nt01 tr ON ti.item_id = tr.item_id LEFT JOIN tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti1 ON tr.req_item = ti1.item_id WHERE ti.type_id = '1000' OR ti.type_id = '1001' ORDER BY ti.item_id

SELECT ti.item_id AS itemid, ti.name AS itemnm, ti.desc AS itemdesc, ti.sell_pri AS sellprice, ti.buy_pri AS buyprice FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti WHERE ti.type_id = '3000' OR ti.type_id = '3001' OR ti.type_id = '3002'
SELECT ti.item_id AS itemid, ti.name AS itemnm, ti.desc AS itemdesc, ti.sell_pri AS sellprice, ti.buy_pri AS buyprice FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti WHERE type_id = '3004' or type_id= '2002'

SELECT ti.item_id AS itemid, ti.type_id AS typeid, ti.name AS itemnm, ti.desc AS itemdesc, ti.sell_pri AS sellprice, ti.buy_pri AS buyprice FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti WHERE type_id = '2001' or type_id= '3005'
SELECT ti.item_id AS itemid, ti.type_id AS typeid, ti.name AS itemnm, ti.desc AS itemdesc, ti.sell_pri AS sellprice, ti.buy_pri AS buyprice FROM tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti WHERE type_id = '2000'

SELECT gq.qno AS questno, gq.qnm AS questnm, gq.qmemo AS questmemo, gq.q_obj AS qitemid , ti.name as qitemnm, gq.q_ocnt AS qitemcnt, gq.q_reward AS ritemid, ti2.name as ritemnm, gq.q_reward_cnt AS ritemcnt, gq.sfalg AS submit, gq.cflag AS complete FROM baseball.tbl_unt_quest_nt01 gq INNER JOIN tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti ON ti.item_id = gq.q_obj INNER JOIN tbl_unt_item_mt01 ti2 ON ti2.item_id = gq.q_reward
